verses.verse: And I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> from the <S%G3485>temple,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels,<s%> <S%G5217>"Go<s%> and <S%G1632>pour<s%> out the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5357>bowls<s%> of the <S%G2372>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> into the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>"

And the <S%G4413>first<s%> [angel] <S%G565>went<s%> and <S%G1632>poured<s%> out his <S%G5357>bowl<s%> into the <S%G1093>earth;<s%> and it <S%G1096>became<s%> a <S%G2556>loathsome<s%> and <S%G4190>malignant<s%> <S%G1668>sore<s%> upon the <S%G444>men<s%> who <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G5480>mark<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast<s%> and who <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> his <S%G1504>image.<s%>

And the <S%G1208>second<s%> [angel] <S%G1632>poured<s%> out his <S%G5357>bowl<s%> into the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> and it <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> [that] of a <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G3498>man;<s%> and <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G2222>living<s%> <S%G5590>thing<s%> in the <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G599>died.<s%>

And the <S%G5154>third<s%> [angel] <S%G1632>poured<s%> out his <S%G5357>bowl<s%> into the <S%G4215>rivers<s%> and the <S%G4077>springs<s%> of <S%G5204>waters;<s%> and they <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G129>blood.<s%>

And I <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G5204>waters<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1342>"Righteous<s%> <S%G1510>art<s%> Thou, who <S%G1510>art<s%> and <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G1510>wast,<s%> O <S%G3741>Holy<s%> <S%G3741>One,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> Thou didst <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things;<s%>

for they <S%G1632>poured<s%> out the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G40>saints<s%> and <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> and Thou hast <S%G1325>given<s%> them <S%G129>blood<s%> to <S%G4095>drink.<s%> They <S%G514>deserve<s%> it. "

And I <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G2379>altar<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3483>"Yes,<s%> O <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> the <S%G3841>Almighty,<s%> <S%G228>true<s%> and <S%G1342>righteous<s%> are Thy <S%G2920>judgments.<s%>"

And the <S%G5067>fourth<s%> [angel] <S%G1632>poured<s%> out his <S%G5357>bowl<s%> upon the <S%G2246>sun;<s%> and it was <S%G1325>given<s%> to it to <S%G2739>scorch<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> with <S%G4442>fire.<s%>

And <S%G444>men<s%> were <S%G2739>scorched<s%> with <S%G3173>fierce<s%> <S%G2738>heat;<s%> and they <S%G987>blasphemed<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> who <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G1849>power<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G4127>plagues;<s%> and they did not <S%G3340>repent,<s%> so as to <S%G1325>give<s%> Him <S%G1391>glory.<s%>

And the <S%G3991>fifth<s%> [angel] <S%G1632>poured<s%> out his <S%G5357>bowl<s%> upon the <S%G2362>throne<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast;<s%> and his <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G4656>darkened;<s%> and they <S%G3145>gnawed<s%> their <S%G1100>tongues<s%> <S%G1537>because<s%> of <S%G4192>pain,<s%>

and they <S%G987>blasphemed<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1537>because<s%> of their <S%G4192>pains<s%> and their <S%G1668>sores;<s%> and they did not <S%G3340>repent<s%> of their <S%G2041>deeds.<s%>

And the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> [angel] <S%G1632>poured<s%> out his <S%G5357>bowl<s%> upon the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4215>river,<s%> the <S%G2166>Euphrates;<s%> and its <S%G5204>water<s%> was <S%G3583>dried<s%> up, that the <S%G3598>way<s%> might be <S%G2090>prepared<s%> for the <S%G935>kings<s%> from the <S%G395>east.<s%> <S%G2246><s%>

And I <S%G3708>saw<s%> [coming] out of the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of the <S%G1404>dragon<s%> and out of the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast<s%> and out of the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of the <S%G5578>false<s%> <S%G5578>prophet,<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G944>frogs;<s%>

for they are <S%G4151>spirits<s%> of <S%G1140>demons,<s%> <S%G4160>performing<s%> <S%G4592>signs,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1607>go<s%> out to the <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3625>world,<s%> to <S%G4863>gather<s%> them <S%G4863>together<s%> for the <S%G4171>war<s%> of the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> the <S%G3841>Almighty.<s%>

(" <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> I am <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G2812>thief.<s%> <S%G3107>Blessed<s%> is the one who <S%G1127>stays<s%> <S%G1127>awake<s%> and <S%G5083>keeps<s%> his <S%G2440>garments,<s%> <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> he <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G4043>about<s%> <S%G1131>naked<s%> and men <S%G991>see<s%> his <S%G808>shame.<s%>" )
And they <S%G4863>gathered<s%> them <S%G4863>together<s%> to the <S%G5117>place<s%> which in <S%G1447>Hebrew<s%> is <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G717>Har-Magedon.<s%>

And the <S%G1442>seventh<s%> [angel] <S%G1632>poured<s%> out his <S%G5357>bowl<s%> upon the <S%G109>air;<s%> and a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out of the <S%G3485>temple<s%> from the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "It is <S%G1096>done.<s%>"

And there were <S%G796>flashes<s%> of <S%G796>lightning<s%> and <S%G5456>sounds<s%> and <S%G1027>peals<s%> of <S%G1027>thunder;<s%> and there was a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4578>earthquake,<s%> <S%G3634>such<s%> as there had not <S%G1096>been<s%> <S%G575>since<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> to be upon the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G5082>so<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> an <S%G4578>earthquake<s%> [was it, and] <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G3173>mighty.<s%>

And the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> was <S%G1096>split<s%> into <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3313>parts,<s%> and the <S%G4172>cities<s%> of the <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G4098>fell.<s%> And <S%G897>Babylon<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> was <S%G3403>remembered<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> her the <S%G4221>cup<s%> of the <S%G3631>wine<s%> of His <S%G2372>fierce<s%> <S%G3709>wrath.<s%>
And <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3520>island<s%> <S%G5343>fled<s%> <S%G5343>away,<s%> and the <S%G3735>mountains<s%> were not <S%G2147>found.<s%>

And <S%G3173>huge<s%> <S%G5464>hailstones,<s%> <S%G5613>about<s%> <S%G5006>one<s%> <S%G5006>hundred<s%> <S%G5006>pounds<s%> each, <S%G2597>came<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven<s%> upon <S%G444>men;<s%> and <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G987>blasphemed<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1537>because<s%> of the <S%G4127>plague<s%> of the <S%G5464>hail,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> its <S%G4127>plague<s%> was <S%G4970>extremely<s%> <S%G3173>severe.<s%>
